com.thinkaurelius.titan.core.schema

Interface TitanManagement.IndexBuilder

  • Enclosing interface:
    TitanManagement

    public static interface TitanManagement.IndexBuilder
    Builder for TitanGraphIndex. Allows for the configuration of a graph index prior to its construction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      • indexOnly

        TitanManagement.IndexBuilder indexOnly(TitanSchemaType schemaType)
        Restricts this index to only those elements that have the provided schemaType. If this graph index indexes vertices, then the argument is expected to be a vertex label and only vertices with that label will be indexed. Likewise, for edges and properties only those with the matching relation type will be indexed.
        Parameters:
        schemaType -
        Returns:
        this IndexBuilder

      • unique

        TitanManagement.IndexBuilder unique()
        Makes this a unique index for the configured element type, i.e. an index key can be associated with at most one element in the graph.
        Returns:
        this IndexBuilder

      • buildCompositeIndex

        TitanGraphIndex buildCompositeIndex()
        Builds a composite index according to the specification
        Returns:
        the created composite TitanGraphIndex

      • buildMixedIndex

        TitanGraphIndex buildMixedIndex(String backingIndex)
        Builds a mixed index according to the specification against the backend index with the given name (i.e. the name under which that index is configured in the graph configuration)
        Parameters:
        backingIndex - the name of the mixed index
        Returns:
        the created mixed TitanGraphIndex
